value:
$WmMPID_海賊リフィス,ch07_16_Rifis_M_Pirate21,Face|It appears I chose the wrong people
to approach to be my underlings...$k$pAh, there! That woman looks
normal enough....$k$pHey, you! Want to join my crew?$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ビーゼ,ch11_21_Wiese_F_Pirate21,Face|Huh? ...Me? I already have a captain,
so I'll have to pass.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊リフィス,ch07_16_Rifis_M_Pirate21,Face|Oh... Right.$k$pDamn it! This is not going as
I'd hoped.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヒノカ,ch05_26_Hinoka_FF_Pair,Face|All right! If we win, the treasure
will be ours... We won't lose!$k$p$nMPID_カミラ|That's right! Ooh... I can't wait
to see that smiling face when we
present our treasure!$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ネサラ,ch11_06_Naesala_M_Pirate21,Face|I don't know what you two are
talking about, but...if there are riches
to plunder, I'm right there with you.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Pirate21,Face|This may be little more than festival
entertainment to you, but...defying
me can only mean death!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_海賊リフィス,ch07_16_Rifis_M_Pirate21,Face|Curses... I failed to bring on even one
swabbie. That said, given the folks
around here, it might be for the best.$k$p...Is everyone in Askr so terrifying?
Sends a shiver down my spine just
picturing their faces!$k$pNo way am I going to spend my days
bowing to monsters like that.$k$pI'll just wait for the summoner to be
looking in the other direction and
make my escape...$k$p...Wait! What am I saying?! Askr is
absolutely full of treasure!$k$pNo need to panic and rush off.
If I can bide my time and wait for
a perfect opportunity, then... Heh.$k$pThat ought to allow me plenty of
time to survey the goods as well.$k$p...Hell, I may even run into Safy
sooner or later!$k$p$Sbs150|
